content.data: Use the drop down selector here to select your Secondary Machine.
There is another option in the Secondary Machine selector.

Pre-Band  
 - This instructs the S2M Center whether you band your cut to size parts 
 prior to placing them on your secondary machine. If you do this set Pre-Band 
 to Yes, this will take into account edge banding thickness in Secondary 
 machining operations, otherwise, leave it at the default of No.
